content.body:
### Shop 275/70R22.5 Tire Size 
275/70R22.5 tires are light and medium truck tires that are commonly used on interstate buses, local and regional route trucks, pickup and delivery trucks, dump trucks, box trucks, and service vehicles.Operators of commercial trucks can’t have downtime, so they need a tire that’s damage resistant, engineered for long wear, retreadable, has a high load capacity, and can offer dependable traction in wet or dry conditions. 

Looking for a new set of 275/70R22.5 tires for your commercial truck? Consider the Michelin XTY2, Continental HRS2 SA, Yokohama MY507, and [Hankook AH37](https://simpletire.com/brands/hankook-tires/ah37). All these commercial tires offer the kind of dependability, performance, and value you’re looking for!

Whether you need a commercial or another type of tire, SimpleTire has a set of 275/70R22.5 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
